General.Name: Eson Precision Ind Co Ltd
General.Description: Eson Precision Ind. Co., Ltd. designs, develops, manufactures, and sells mechanical parts for consuming electrical products in Taiwan and internationally. The company also designs, manufactures, and sells precision molds, plastics, flat-panel displays, electronic components, and hardware products; and provides cosmetic treatment onto products, and whole set unit assembling services. Its products include TV, 3C, network, automotive, tooling, photoelectric, and PC products. The company was formerly known as Multiwin Precision Ind. Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Eson Precision Ind. Co., Ltd. Eson Precision Ind. Co., Ltd. was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Grand Cayman, the Cayman Islands.
General.Address: No. 88, Yuanfeng Road, Kunshan, China, KY1-1205
